page.title: 08Possessions 2 Shobdon/Byton
page.content:
{The next 20 most common possessions:}
47 homes....automatic washing machine 44 homes had a music centre (hi-fi) 40 homes had a black & white t.v. 39 homes had an electric shaver 37 homes had a bicycle 36 homes....electric sandwich maker 34 homes had a greenhouse 31 homes had a deep fat fryer 30 homes....coffee maker/percolator 30 homes had a shower 29 homes had an electric knife 28 homes had a hedge trimmer 28 homes had a tumble drier 27 homes....twin-tub washing machine 23 homes had a food processor 21 homes had a Rayburn/Aga cooker 20 homes had a spin drier 20 homes had a fridge/freezer 19 homes had a rotivator 18 homes had a video recorder
